mosinstall.author: MetZ

mosinstall.description:
This is a rewrite of the Fireboard latest posts module by fuQaHa

This module will display latest posts, based on settings in module configuration.

  • Number of posts to display
  • What categories to display posts from
  • What posts to display (first, last, all)
  • Display posts on user access
  • Link to CB profiles
  • Possibilty to style the module

If you like this module, please make a Donation!


Thanks ;)

param.name: num_posts
param.label: Number of posts
param.description: Number of posts to display

param.name: only_categories
param.label: Only show categories
param.description: Only include posts from the specific categories (give IDs separated by commas, e.g. 1,2,3), leave blank to include all categories. Include -1 to indicate the currently viewed category.
